column4: using 'sudo apt-get install git-core linux-headers-generic' I get 'git-core is already the newest version.
E: Couldn't find package linux-headers-generic
using 'sudo apt-get install git-core linux-headers-generic' I get 'git-core is already the newest version. E: Couldn't find package linux-headers-generic
anyone know why it's not finding linux-headers-generic?
pastebin your /etc/apt/sources.list
kk.
dapper does not have that package
dapper does not have that package, you don't add it.  You probably want something else (hint: apt-cache search linux headers)

yeah off the live cd
use the alternate cd to install and then resolve the graphics card issues if there are any
